regen.absent_element: alert method via email for multiple failed login attempts
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the System Administrator via email when multiple failed login attempts are recorded from the same user.

regen.absent_element: protocol for communicating security alerts effectively
regen.new_specification: The system should provide configurable options for the System Administrator to choose how often and through what communication channels (e.g., immediate email alert, daily summary email, SMS) the alerts for multiple failed logins are sent.

regen.absent_element: email alert to the System Administrator for multiple failed login attempts
regen.new_specification: The system shall email the System Administrator when multiple failed login attempts are detected from the same user.

label: These warnings are sent to the System Administrator.
absence: action of sending warnings for failed login
